org.apache.solr.analytics.request

Class RangeFacetRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.analytics.request.AbstractFieldFacetRequest
      • org.apache.solr.analytics.request.RangeFacetRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FacetRequest

    public class RangeFacetRequest
extends AbstractFieldFacetRequest
    Contains all of the specifications for a range facet.
